name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D】hololive English -Advent- 2nd Anniversary Live： On the Run! [dpcCFGRm5zM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Shiori Novella completes her turn in the 'Master of Advent' game and discusses her choice of being a werewolf over a vampire. She then sprays the other members with a water gun.
Mococo Abyssgard takes her turn, asking whether she'd rather collect seashells or make sandcastles. Confusion ensues about which side is which, leading to more water spraying.
Fuwawa Abyssgard asks about her preference for long-haired or short-haired cats. She surprises the others with her choice, and they react to the dynamic nature of the game.
Koseki Bijou poses a classic hypothetical question about fighting many small hippos versus one large chicken. The results lead to the final round of the game segment.

subtitles.original:
Which would Shiori rather be?
A: A vampire B: A werewolf
subtitles.english:
Which would Shiori rather be?
A: A vampire B: A werewolf

subtitles.original: I don't want to drink blood, what am I, stupid?
subtitles.english: I don't want to drink blood, what am I, stupid?

subtitles.original: Whoa, that's unexpected.
subtitles.english: Whoa, that's unexpected.

subtitles.original: I seriously thought you were going to say vampire.
subtitles.english: I seriously thought you were going to say vampire.

subtitles.original: You got that dog in you?
subtitles.english: You got that dog in you?

subtitles.original: I literally have the dog in me, yeah.
subtitles.english: I literally have the dog in me, yeah.

subtitles.original: Go! Go wash yourself!
subtitles.english: Go! Go wash yourself!

subtitles.original: Oh god, what is it...?
subtitles.english: Oh god, what is it...?

subtitles.original: You too, I'm watching you.
subtitles.english: You too, I'm watching you.

subtitles.original: Well, you got us all wet, Shiori, are you happy?
subtitles.english: Well, you got us all wet, Shiori, are you happy?

subtitles.original: Not yet.
subtitles.english: Not yet.

subtitles.original: All right, well, next one, how about Mococo?
subtitles.english: All right, well, next one, how about Mococo?

subtitles.original: Moco-chan! My- my turn!
subtitles.english: Moco-chan! My- my turn!

subtitles.original: Okay, well, here I go! Um, at the beach...
subtitles.english: Okay, well, here I go! Um, at the beach...

Which would Mococo do at the beach?
A: Collect seashells B: Make sandcastles
subtitles.english:
Which would Mococo do at the beach?
A: Collect seashells B: Make sandcastles

subtitles.original: Would I rather collect seashells, A...
subtitles.english: Would I rather collect seashells, A...

subtitles.original: ...or, um, how was it? Ah, make sandcastles, B?
subtitles.english: ...or, um, how was it? Ah, make sandcastles, B?

subtitles.original: Okay, Biboo, ready?
subtitles.english: Okay, Biboo, ready?

subtitles.original: Okay, jump on three.
subtitles.english: Okay, jump on three.

subtitles.original: Three, two, one!
subtitles.english: Three, two, one!

subtitles.original: I can't remember!
subtitles.english: I can't remember!

subtitles.original: This was seashells and this was sandcastles.
subtitles.english: This was seashells and this was sandcastles.

subtitles.original: Wait, you chose this way, Shiori?
subtitles.english: Wait, you chose this way, Shiori?

subtitles.original: No, I thought you wanted this one!
subtitles.english: No, I thought you wanted this one!

subtitles.original: I- I made a mistake!
subtitles.english: I- I made a mistake!

subtitles.original:
I'd rather collect seashells, but I jumped this
way, so that means this way is right!
subtitles.english:
I'd rather collect seashells, but I jumped this
way, so that means this way is right!

subtitles.original: This is so unfair!
subtitles.english: This is so unfair!

subtitles.original: Moco-chan won! No!
subtitles.english: Moco-chan won! No!

subtitles.original: Help me! Biboo! Biboo!
subtitles.english: Help me! Biboo! Biboo!

subtitles.original: Shiori, see you for now.
subtitles.english: Shiori, see you for now.

subtitles.original: Yeah, for now, for now! Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Yeah, for now, for now! Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Okay, have fun!
subtitles.english: Okay, have fun!

subtitles.original: That is so mean!
subtitles.english: That is so mean!

subtitles.original: Seriously!
subtitles.english: Seriously!

subtitles.english: It was a game of chance! How about Fuwawa next?

subtitles.original: I don't get to get dirty this time, right? Yeah.
subtitles.english: I don't get to get dirty this time, right? Yeah.

subtitles.english: Okay, my question!

A: Long-haired cats B: Short-haired cats

A: Long-haired cats B: Short-haired cats

subtitles.original: ...long-haired cats or short-haired cats?
subtitles.english: ...long-haired cats or short-haired cats?

subtitles.original: Okay, I'm the fluffy one! Bau bau! Here we go!
subtitles.english: Okay, I'm the fluffy one! Bau bau! Here we go!

subtitles.original: Three, two, one!
subtitles.english: Three, two, one!

subtitles.original: No way!
subtitles.english: No way!

What, really? You prefer short hair? You're the
fluffy one!
subtitles.english:
What, really? You prefer short hair? You're the
fluffy one!

subtitles.original:
It's too easy! It's a trick question! It's so
obvious!

It's too easy! It's a trick question! It's so

subtitles.original: Oh, you're so mean to me!
subtitles.english: Oh, you're so mean to me!

subtitles.original: You deserve it! Oh, you're so terrible!
subtitles.english: You deserve it! Oh, you're so terrible!

subtitles.english: Think before! Ah, think about it!

subtitles.original: Ah, that feels nice! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Ah, that feels nice! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Well, it's going to be your turn next!
subtitles.english: Well, it's going to be your turn next!

I don't- I don't want to play this game anymore!
It's so dynamic!

It's so dynamic!

subtitles.original: Okay! Okay, is it Biboo's turn now?
subtitles.english: Okay! Okay, is it Biboo's turn now?

subtitles.original: It's Biboo's turn now. Okay.
subtitles.english: It's Biboo's turn now. Okay.

subtitles.original: My question is, ooh, okay. Would I rather fight...
subtitles.english: My question is, ooh, okay. Would I rather fight...

A: One hundred chicken-sized hippopotamuses
B: One hippopotamus-sized chicken

A: One hundred chicken-sized hippopotamuses

subtitles.english: One hundred... one hundred chicken-sized hippos...

...or one hippopotamus-sized chicken? I'm not
repeating it.
subtitles.english:

subtitles.original: ...three, two, one! Ha!

Biboo! Biboo doesn't like adds, Biboo likes boss
battles! You should have known!
